PLOT:


Monty Capuletti could receive 10 million dollars as an inheritance from his late mother-in-law's estate. Her will states he must first curb his vices for a year, which include smoking, drinking and gambling to name a few. It is a hard question: be rich and boring all day or be depraved and amusing...


TAGLINE: I was happy being a big fat slob, but for $10 million...I'll give up everything! No cheating! No gambling! No booze! No smoking! No pizza! No nothin'! We're taking all the fun out of life - and putting it into a movie!
